holidays.title: National Entrepreneur's Day
holidays.description: Radical inventions by brilliant minds have shaped our lives today, not to mention our future.

holidays.title: Discovery of Puerto Rico Day
holidays.description: Columbus landed in Puerto Rico during his second voyage — today, we share all about it.

holidays.title: Garifuna Settlement Day
holidays.description: Out of the nearly 5,000 exiled Garifunas, only 2,500 made it to Belize.

holidays.title: International Journalist Day
holidays.description: Learn more about this day that honors the hard work done by journalists.

holidays.title: Monaco National Day
holidays.description: Let's recognize the uniqueness of Monaco as we celebrate Monaco National Day.

holidays.title: National Camp Day
holidays.description: Whether it was summer camp or a family trip, we have lots of wilderness memories.

holidays.title: National Carbonated Beverage With Caffeine Day
holidays.description: Prepare your jumbo mugs as we celebrate the world’s most craved mood-boosting stimulant drinks.

holidays.title: National Have A Bad Day Day
holidays.description: Take a break, show your true emotions, and enjoy one of the oddest days.

holidays.title: National Integration Day
holidays.description: The message is one of unity and the importance of integration, regardless of race or religion.

holidays.title: National Lewis Day
holidays.description: Join us as we take our hats off to all Lewis’ on their special day.

holidays.title: National Play Monopoly Day
holidays.description: Get ready with your board and pieces; you’re going to enjoy Monopoly like never before!

holidays.title: Women Entrepreneurship Day
holidays.description: Let us use today to appreciate the contributions of women entrepreneurs around the world.

holidays.title: Women’s Entrepreneurship Day
holidays.description: Appreciate the (s)heroes who make up a significant part of the entrepreneurial world.

holidays.title: World Toilet Day
holidays.description: If you'd like an "ode to the commode" read ahead.

holidays.title: Adam Driver’s Birthday
holidays.description: Driver is a perfect example of hard work and dedication paying off!

holidays.title: Apollo Nida’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality T.V. star rose to prominence after appearing on "The Real Housewives of Atlanta."

holidays.title: Calvin Klein’s Birthday

holidays.title: FaZe Rug’s Birthday
holidays.description: This skilled gamer has the most FaZe Clan YouTube subscriptions — today, we're celebrating him!

holidays.title: Indira Gandhi’s Birthday
holidays.description: This amazing, intelligent woman was the first woman Prime Minister of India.

holidays.title: James Beavers’s Birthday
holidays.description: This famous YouTuber has made a name for himself in the gaming industry.

holidays.title: Jodie Foster’s Birthday
holidays.description: The queen of drama has had and continues to have a flourishing career in the genre.

holidays.title: Kassandra Lee’s Birthday
holidays.description: She's a fantastic YouTuber and social media star, and she's gorgeous to boot!

holidays.description: Larry King captivated audiences worldwide with his frank interviews and quirky sense of humor.

holidays.title: Lauren Burnham’s Birthday
holidays.description: Burnham’s life story was made for T.V., full of unexplained coincidences and rays of hope.

holidays.title: Lil' Mo’s Birthday
holidays.description: Lil Mo’ is a jack of all trades. Singing, songwriting, DJing, and even being an entrepreneur.

holidays.title: Tyga’s Birthday
holidays.description: He's an award-winning rapper and icon to millions! We're celebrating Tyga today!
